Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Avenue/Magnolia
ShortDescription: #72 buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Elston, Division, Halsted, and North Ave, due to police activity near North Avenue/Magnolia.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Elston, Division, Halsted, and North Ave, due to police activity near North Avenue/Magnolia.

Allow extra travel time.
